titlestmt.titleproper: Ford Foundation records, Staff Subject Files, Taryn Higashi
A Guide to the Ford Foundation records, Staff Subject Files, Taryn Higashi FA683

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2022-06-01 00:49:25 -0400.
profiledesc.langusage: Description is written in: English, Latin script.

did.unittitle: Ford Foundation records, Staff Subject Files, Taryn Higashi

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Open for research with select materials restricted as noted. Brittle or damaged items are available at the discretion of RAC. Researchers interested in accessing digital media (floppy disks, CDs, DVDs, etc.) in this collection must use an access surrogate. The original items may not be accessed because of preservation concerns. To request an access surrogate be made, or if you are unsure if there is an access surrogate, please contact an archivist.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: This material was transferred to RAC in 2019 by the Ford Foundation and ingested by RAC as Accessions 2019:180 and 2019:154.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection contains reports, grant-related materials, and correpondence from Taryn Higashi's roles within the Peace and Social Justice Program (PSJ), Human Rights and International Cooperation Unit (HRIC) at the Ford Foundation.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection is arranged "as received" from the Ford Foundation.
